name: How Latternin
description:
Give it a minute to load, there's a lot of sound files in this one...

WARNING: Jumpscare...? 

This game is a personal exploration of my OC, Latternin,  Storm Dainbold's brother. It's also my 1st horror game. I rushed in making this sooo it is not complete. But I had a blast making this. Learned a lot about how Wick Editor and Javascript works. 

As part of the jam's challenge, I made it using the Game Randomizer as provided by the Jam. You can see the prompt I got from the screenshot.
